title: Sequence File
description: Schema for submission of a file containing sequence data.

file_format.comment: Once validated, fastq files must have read count and the minimum, maximum, and mean read lengths.

content_type.comment: Content Type describes the content of the file. Reads are individual sequences of bases corresponding to DNA or RNA fragments in a FASTQ text file format. Subreads are sequences of bases produced using PacBio platforms.

items.title: External identifier
items.description: Identifier from an external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with IGVF file objects.

flowcell_id.title: Flowcell ID
flowcell_id.description: The alphanumeric identifier for the flowcell of a sequencing machine.

lane.title: Lane
lane.description: An integer identifying the lane of a sequencing machine.

read_count.title: Read Count
read_count.description: Number of reads in a fastq file.
read_count.comment: Do not submit. This value is calculated by the checkfiles script upon submission.

minimum_read_length.title: Minimum Read Length
minimum_read_length.description: For high-throughput sequencing, the minimum number of contiguous nucleotides determined by sequencing.
minimum_read_length.comment: Do not submit. This value is calculated by the checkfiles script upon submission.

maximum_read_length.title: Read Length
maximum_read_length.description: For high-throughput sequencing, the maximum number of contiguous nucleotides determined by sequencing.
maximum_read_length.comment: Do not submit. This value is calculated by the checkfiles script upon submission.

mean_read_length.title: Read Length
mean_read_length.description: For high-throughput sequencing, the mean number of contiguous nucleotides determined by sequencing.
mean_read_length.comment: Do not submit. This value is calculated by the checkfiles script upon submission.

sequencing_platform.title: Sequencing Platform
sequencing_platform.description: The measurement device used to produce sequencing data.

sequencing_run.title: Sequencing Run
sequencing_run.description: An ordinal number indicating which sequencing run of the associated library that the file belongs to.

illumina_read_type.title: Illumina Read Type
illumina_read_type.description: The read type of the file. Relevant only for files produced using an Illumina sequencing platform.

seqspec.title: Link to seqspec YAML File
seqspec.description: The link to the associated seqspec YAML configuration file.
